text:
Looker | San Francisco, USA | Full-time | ONSITE

Join our product security team as a Senior Application Security Engineer.

Looker is seeking a senior application security engineer to conduct architecture security reviews and penetration testing modeled after real work attackers. We work cross-functionally with teams across the organization to find and mitigate risk within the Looker product.

https://jobs.lever.co/looker/6b6ce2eb-76cf-4d1c-931e-4bdbf4c...

Please feel free to reach out to me directly at david.moore@looker.com if you are interested or have any questions - Thank you
